channel.title: Sex Workers on Internet Freedom Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Sex Workers on Internet Freedom Foundation

item.title: Move fast, break things? Not when sensitive health data is at stake! #SaveOurPrivacy
item.description: We wrote to the National Health Authority seeking enactment of general and sectoral data protection laws and meaningful public consultation prior to deployment of any national digital health ID programme.

item.title: Why is porn being blocked in India? #WhatTheBlock
item.description: RTI response from MeitY reveals that blocking of porn in India is a result of three court orders and ISPs have not been directed to pro-actively block porn websites.
